summary: Anna is from Piedmont, she loves opera and French literature. Piero, her husband, is from Calabria, loves football and other women.
cast: Ficarra|Picone|Claudio Bisio|Nancy Brilli|Emilio Solfrizzi|Serena Autieri|Francesca Inaudi|Luciana Littizzetto|Lorenzo Cesari|Wilma De Angelis|Gigio Alberti|Roberto Angelelli|Luca Biagini|Laura Calgani|Luca Canale Brucculeri|Giuseppe Cederna|Edoardo Cesari|Paola Cortellesi|Fabio De Luigi|Armando De Razza|Metis Di Meo|Massimo Franceschi|Chiara Francini|Tongquing Ke|Marianna Lambiase|Rosabell Laurenti Sellers|Maurizio Lops|Massimo Morini|Lucia Ocone|Francesca Piccinini|Alessandro Preziosi|Fabrizio Rizzolo|Paolo Ruffini|Enzo Salvi|Hassani Shapi|Carla Signoris|Davide Solenghi|Matteo Urzia|Nicolas Vaporidis|John Wing|Giorgia Wurth|Marta Zoffoli|Sarah Felberbaum
title: Mujeres contra hombres
